text: Lokera apanake mada [1] o juya [2] samparke jijjesa kare. Baluna, ‘du’tora madhye'i ache mahapapa ebam manusera jan'ya upakara'o; ara e du’tora papa upakarera ceye aneka bara’. Ara tara apanake jijjesa kare ki tara byaya karabe? Baluna, ya udbrtta [3]. Ebhabe allah‌ tamra ayatasamuha tomadera jan'ya suspastabhabe byakta karena, yate tomara cinta kara
